headache.name: Headache
follow_up_questions: How would you rate your headache pain on a scale of 1-10?
Where exactly is the pain located? (forehead, temples, back of head, etc.)
When did the headache start?
Have you experienced any nausea or vomiting?
Do you have any vision changes or sensitivity to light?
Have you taken any medications for the pain?
red_flags: headache with fever and neck stiffness

fever.name: Fever
follow_up_questions: What is your current temperature?
How long have you had the fever?
Are you experiencing chills or sweating?
Do you have any other symptoms like cough, sore throat, or body aches?
Have you traveled recently or been exposed to anyone who was sick?
Are you taking any medications to reduce the fever?
red_flags: fever with severe headache and neck stiffness

chest_pain.name: Chest Pain
follow_up_questions: How would you describe the pain? (sharp, crushing, burning, aching)
Where exactly in your chest do you feel the pain?
Does the pain spread to your arms, neck, jaw, or back?
Does the pain get worse with breathing, movement, or exertion?
Are you experiencing shortness of breath?
Do you have any nausea, sweating, or dizziness?
How long has the pain been present?
red_flags: pain radiating to arm or jaw

nausea.name: Nausea
follow_up_questions: Are you actually vomiting or just feeling nauseous?
When did the nausea start?
What were you doing or eating before it started?
Do you have any abdominal pain or cramping?
Are you running a fever?
Are you able to keep fluids down?
Have you had any recent travel or dietary changes?
red_flags: inability to keep fluids down for 24+ hours

cough.name: Cough
follow_up_questions: Is your cough dry or are you bringing up mucus/phlegm?
What color is the mucus? (clear, yellow, green, blood-tinged)
How long have you had the cough?
Do you have fever, chest pain, or shortness of breath?
Is the cough worse at night or during certain activities?
Do you smoke or have you been exposed to irritants?
Have you recently had a cold or respiratory infection?
